name: One life (artbohr)
description:
Your daughter was captured by an evil being who wants to play a game with you. He has 6 evil servants who will try to fool you in to believing that they are your daughter but they are just lifeless copies of your daughter and only one of them is your daughter Lily. Pay close attention to what they say and choose wisely, Lily's life is on the line.

P.S: This game is not meant to be replayed, once you kill your daughter there is no way back, you will know who she is in the next playthrough, so you only have one chance to save her.
